section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Justice William J. Brennan, Jr.

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: The judgment and opinion of the Court in 76-439, the Territorial Guam against Olsen will be announced by Mr. Justice Brennan.

turn.speaker: william_j_brennan_jr
turn.label: Justice William J. Brennan, Jr.
turn.text: In this case, the Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit held that the Organic Act of Guam which was enacted in 1950 does not authorized the Guam legislature to divest the United States District Court created by the Act of its jurisdiction granted by that Act to hear appeals from local Guam courts and to transfer that jurisdiction to a newly created Guam Supreme Court.
Mr. Justice Marshall dissents and has filed a dissenting opinion in which Mr. Justice Stewart, Mr. Justice Rehnquist and Mr. Justice Stevens joined.
